name: ChessMatePuzzles
description:
Handtracking Chesspuzzles in VR: Oculus. Made in Unity during a 1week jam.
Android APK.

Enjoy 3 different levels of difficulty in chess puzzles or play free form.

All chess assets created from scratch using Blender. Table used from the demo scene for handtracking with the Oculus package.

Not fully tested. Version 1.
